channel.title: Challis|Custer County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Challis|Custer County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: End ID-75 North at US-93
item.description: End ID-75 at US-93. Turn left for US-93 north to Challis and Salmon. Turn right for US-93 south to Arco. US-93 north is part of the Salmon River Scenic Byway; US-93 south is part of the Peaks to Craters Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-93 North - No Gas Next 57 Miles
item.description: US-93 North - No Gas/Diesel Next 57 Miles (in Salmon). Taken on the north end of Challis.

item.title: End ID-75 North at US-93
item.description: End ID-75 at US-93. Turn left for US-93 north to Challis and Salmon. Turn right for US-93 south to Arco. US-93 north is part of the Salmon River Scenic Byway; US-93 south is part of the Peaks to Craters Scenic Byway.

item.title: ID-75 South - Salmon River Scenic Byway
item.description: Begin ID-75 South/Salmon River Scenic Byway, just south of US-93.

item.title: US- 93 South at ID-75
item.description: US-93 south at northern end of ID-75.

item.title: Main St. in Challis at US-93
US-93 South at ID-75
item.description: US-93 South at ID-75 Junction to Arco

item.title: US-93 South at ID-75
